spatial_accuracy.notes: Major mismatch between the 2D plan (kitchen/pantry/dining/utility/WC/central hall with bay window seat) and the 3D render (appears to depict a multi-bedroom residential layout with a long corridor). Room placement does not correspond; walls and circulation are not aligned to the 2D layout. Door and window locations in the render do not match the plan’s indicated openings (notably the dining room bay/window seat zone and kitchen-side openings). Strong proportion drift: the 3D render’s room sizes and overall footprint do not preserve the plan’s geometry.

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency relationships from the plan are not respected (kitchen–pantry–dining–utility–WC cluster is not reproduced). Multiple plan rooms are missing and replaced by hallucinated bedrooms/corridor spaces. Door embeddings/openings do not correspond to the plan’s door swings/locations. Wall thicknesses are stylized and inconsistent relative to the plan’s clearly defined wall structure.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture in the 3D render (beds, bedroom furniture) does not map to the 2D plan’s program (dining room, kitchen work zones, utility/HVAC, WC). Scale and placement therefore cannot be considered accurate relative to the plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric view is generally acceptable and readable, but the model is blurry/low-detail with muddy textures and indistinct room boundaries (visual clarity issue). Lighting is soft but flat. Geometry appears mostly clean, though details (doors/windows) are simplified and inconsistent.

detected_errors.description: Missing Kitchen (2D plan shows a defined kitchen with counters/appliances; 3D render does not depict a corresponding kitchen space/layout).
Missing Dining Room and the associated large open rectangular space shown in the plan.
Missing Pantry (explicit in plan adjacent to kitchen).
Missing Utility Room/HVAC/WH zone (plan shows dedicated utility with labeled equipment areas).
Missing WC (plan shows a WC near the central hall).
Missing Central Hall/Alcove configuration (plan shows central hall and alcove elements not reflected in 3D).
Overall room placement is inconsistent with the plan; 3D layout appears reorganized into bedroom-focused arrangement rather than the plan’s service/core + dining/kitchen arrangement.
Window placement mismatch: plan indicates a prominent dining-room window seat/bay condition; 3D render shows generic windows not aligned to that feature.
Door placement/orientation mismatch: plan has specific door swings/locations (e.g., utility/WC/hall connections) that are not reproduced in the 3D render.
Proportion distortion: the footprint and relative room dimensions in the 3D render do not preserve the plan’s measured rectangular dining room and adjacent kitchen/service proportions.
Hallucinated bedrooms and bedroom furniture: the 3D render includes multiple bed rooms/spaces not present in the provided 2D plan segment.
Rendering artifact/low fidelity: interior elements are blurry and indistinct, reducing verifiability of openings and partitions.
